events.description: Kyle Schwarber lines out to right fielder Mookie Betts. 1 out
Trea Turner doubles (5) on a fly ball to right fielder Mookie Betts, deflected by second baseman Miguel Vargas.
Bryce Harper walks.
Nick Castellanos reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by third baseman Max Muncy. Trea Turner to 3rd. Bryce Harper to 2nd. Fielding error by third baseman Max Muncy.

Alec Bohm walks. Bryce Harper to 3rd. Nick Castellanos to 2nd.
